dmca.title: [ABUSE] Domain www.travel-in-uk.com abuse
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 21, 2005 11:40 AM
To: editor@britainexpress.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Domain www.travel-in-uk.com abuse]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Domain www.travel-in-uk.com abuse
Date: Sun, 20 Mar 2005 17:27:55 -0000
From: Britain Express <editor@britainexpress.com>
Reply-To: Britain Express <editor@britainexpress.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,

I am contacting you about the domain www.travel-in-uk.com which, if I
understand the whois listings correctly, is hosted by your company. The
www.travel-in-uk.com website is copied content, stolen from my website at
www.britainexpress.com. I have contacted the listed registrar of
www.travel-in-uk.com  demanding that the stolen content be taken down, and I
am making the same request to you. My website has been online for
7 years, and I think that even a quick look at the two sites will be
sufficient to prove that the www.travel-in-uk.com domain has illegally
copied my site content.

A swift reply would be greatly appreciated.

Sincerely,

David Ross

Publisher
Britain Express - The UK Travel and Heritage Guide
http://www.britainexpress.com

Ryecroft House
Glebe Farm
Little Rissington
Cheltenham
Gloucestershire
GL54 2ND

Tel 01451 824224
Email: editor@britainexpress.com

- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCPwb5vK/XpJs6oyURAmAgAKCeb0qyANpMN/lWLnLvwt7f7qsBvwCfebWN
b36XgWJRZUstncA+zCIulCM=
=sW5l
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
dmca.principal_name: Britain Express - The UK Travel and Heritage Guide
